Class.name: COM.fwk.www.ui.FormDataFieldsUI
Class.Description:
This class knows how to print a net manager form, but only show its data fields.

As the form edition is always recorded via Hyper Event, it knows how to deal with the temporary edition data, to load the latest edition and to save them in the correct entity.

Author: Heber Brandao - Disclinc Brazil Author: Frank Lima - Disclinc Brazil Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brazil

Method.name: show
Method.Description:
This method calls Net Manager procedures to build the data fields of an automatic form, exactly as configured in the form definition (captions, colors, etc). But, there are some style configuration that will not appear, as the background color of the form.

If the showPrimaryKeys is true, show the primary keys associated with the form.

Author: Heber Brandao - Disclinc Brazil Author: Frank Lima - Disclinc Brazil Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brazil

Method.name: loadLatestEditionData
Method.Description:
Loads the latest data edited in the form treated in this class. If the FormEditionData has data for it, then loads is. Otherwise, loads from the entity's table.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brazil

Method.name: hasEditionData
Method.Description:
Tells if the form has data in edition.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil

Method.name: getEditionData
Method.Description:
Retrives the edition data in the form of a global record (comes from the WWWDATEN).

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brasil
Method.Implementation:
set company = ..associatedUI.getSession().getCurrentCompanyCode() set sessionId = ..associatedUI.getSession().getSessionId()
set formEditionData = ##class(COM.fwk.www.bo.FormBO).%New().getEditionData(..formName)
quit formEditionData.getProperty("DataRecord")

Method.name: loadSavedData
Method.Description:
Loads the last saved data, from the entity table.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brazil

Method.name: getSavedData
Method.Description:
Loads the last saved data for the form, as a global record.

Author: Tharsis Campos - Disclinc Brazil
Method.Implementation:
set company = ..associatedUI.getSession().getCurrentCompanyCode()
set ..pk = pk set classUsedInForm = ##class(COM.fwk.www.bo.FormBO).%New().getClassUsedInForm(..formName) set persistentId = ##class(PersistentUtil).nManagerIdToPersistentId(pk, company) set entity = ##class(COM.fwk.entity.Persistent).loadPersistentEntity(classUsedInForm, persistentId)
quit ##class(PersistentUtil).persistentObjectToGlobalRecord(classUsedInForm, entity)
